Observed at: West Vancouver 5:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
